Review.Titre: Fraudulent way of operating and terrible customer service
Review.Contenu: Fraudulent way of operating and terrible service.Ordered an Apple watch ultra with alpine loop size medium. Initially, the order came in with a random black watch strap. Mistakes like that can happen of course.Upon contacting them, indicating that they provided me with the wrong strap and have to provide the product as mentioned: Apple watch with Alpine loop size medium. They then told me they could send € euros as a replacement. No, of course not I indicated, what I bought was as mentioned so that is what they are obliged to provide. Without any further discussion they then said that they would send the right loop.Then, when I received what was supposed to be the Apple Alpine loop, in reality it was a very cheap Chinese replacement?! Ridiculous, but even worse, it is basically scamming people by providing a different product as mentioned in product description AND product photo.Two and a half weeks down the line and nothing has been resolved.These loops costs €100 new price. This will be followed up by legal action.

The worst service ever. I bought Apple Watch through Refurbed.de with Loop mobile and guess what? 2 weeks going back and forth trying to return it. They keep sending me the same messages, like "what´s the serial number" but from there it doesn´t move anywhere. I am about to contact my lawyer as I see that they just trying trick me into buying that watch, which I don´t want! Worst company ever stay away from them.

I ordered an iphone case and needed to get customer service that I had ordered the wrong case. I have no idea how to return this item. This is the responds I got: Emily L (Loop)Nov 14, 2023, 18:04 GMT+1Thank you for reaching out. This order number is not associated with any Loop service  Best of luck locating the correct Customer Service team. Best,EmilyAnd here is the other message:Your message to  has been blocked. See technical details below for more information. And then there is no information BELOW.
I didn't receive my package. You told me that you need 14 days to deal with it. That is unacceptable! And I didn't receive the tracking number, your promise is fake.
Requiring a signature on a $18 purchase is the dumbest thing I have ever had to endure. I would never use you again because of the inconvenience. Shame on you
I did not receive my computer. It's much more than the two days you promised for delivery I don't know what happened to it can you find out please and let me know thank you.

Review.Titre: you sent me a non-apple charger that…
Review.Contenu: you sent me a non-apple charger that would not charge the apple watch...after initial response to complaint have heard nothing than originally saying you can return the entire GIFT - mind you Christmas gift that did not arrive on time even though said two day shipping....oh can I have your gift back and maybe you'll get something back that will work sometime in the near future....really disappointing and will never use or recommend your business again.

Disappointed, I was directed to their site based upon a Google ad. Regarding iPhone eight Verizon ready phones. The listing on their page made no mention of the phone being only t-mobile Compatible. I put in A refund request and have yet to hear anything in five days. I expect better.

I’ve been attempting to return an Apple Watch and I can’t get anyone to answer my emails….. I initially received an email asking for my order number. I responded with the number and haven’t heard anything for a week.Update 6/20/21Loop Mobile corrected the situation promptly…….. once we made contact they were professional and helpful with my return….. I would use this company again in the future.

If I could give them 0 stars I would. Hands down the worst customer services I have ever experienced. I bought a watch from them and it broke within months and when I contacted them, they had decided to give me a full refund to my original payment method. Instead, a replacement watch shows up a few days later without even informing me. When I reminded them that they told me they would give me a refund, they completely went back on their word because THEY made a mistake. That should not be my problem but because of their poor customer service, it is now my problem. Don’t waste your money on their poorly refurbished products and buy somewhere else.

Purchased a MacBook Air (2020) for Over 800$ for excellent condition. Turns out the screen has water damage, and the back of the MacBook has a big dent. Most definitely getting my money back, and never purchasing something from here again.

Review.Titre: I hate that i hit purchase and sent and…
Review.Contenu: I hate that i hit purchase and sent and the second after i purchased i realized it wasnt then phone i wanted and could bit cancel the purchase. I.have had to receive the phone and return and still waiting See if tal y'all are going to credit my acct back.  You should allow a person time to cancel before shipping it.

I was sent a locked instead of an unlocked IPhone. Reaching customer service to return and replace the phone has been next to impossible. No customer service number and sloop does not return emails within 48 hours. So frustrating. My recommendation: Do not buy from them.

Loop Mobile was selling a NEW iPhone Straight Talk 12 mini on Walmart website. Only problem was the phone was refurbished and NOT NEW. They never mentioned anywhere that they were selling refurbished items on Walmart's site. I bought a New phone and received a used phone. This must be an ongoing scam bc they offered a discount to keep the used phone. I purchased a new phone elsewhere for less than they charged for a used phone. They have tied up my money, delayed my getting a better deal and caused me inconvenience of having to return item to Walmart. Loop has been notified by Walmart on numerous occasions and is fully aware of the situation. Even after learning that the site says "new condition" they have yet to correct the page and continue selling refurbished phones. I made my purchase on 11/16/22 on Walmart.com, the phone was returned to Walmart the day after being received and out for return delivery via Fed Ex. I'm still waiting for my credit.

I am looking forward to updating this review. For now, I have only a meaningless tracking number, not the phone I ordered. According to the email I received the day after my purchase, my phone should have been delivered six days ago, but the tracking number still says "shipment information sent to FedEx." I submitted a support request yesterday. I've gotten lots of communication from them: the tracking number a few times, several coupon codes, and now an email from TrustPilot asking about my experience. But I haven't gotten the item I ordered or a reply to my inquiry about it.

I have been trying to contact Loop Mobile continuously since I made the purchase of the phone, an iPhone SE. I have received NO response. I tried immediately to cancel the order, but that attempt was made too late so the phone arrived. Fine. Even so, I tried MANY TIMES to contact Loop Mobile to get you to send me a FedEx mailing label so. that I can send the phone back to you. I have received NO response from you. It is as if you do not have anyone in customer service. I do not want the phone that you sent to me. It is still in its original packaging. I am shocked at the horrible customer service.

Review.Titre: I never got my phone I ordered
Review.Contenu: I never got my phone I ordered. I wrote an email to the seller but they haven't responded in two days. Guess I'll have to try file a claim with fedex. Basically zero customer support from loop mobile though. This is my second order from them, the first one arrived fine, but no sign at all on my second order. Apparently they don't use boxes to ship their phones, just bubble wrap. You might be best trying somewhere else for iphones not loop mobile.

Review.Titre: A weird hand printed note in the iPhone box
Review.Contenu: I ordered a refurbished iPhone from Amazon. It was delivered via FedEx from Loop today. Delivery was fast, but when I opened the package . . .A hand-printed note saying “I KNOW WHAT YOU DID LAST SUMMER” was on top of the phone inside the box. THIS IS NOT FUNNY. It also leads me to wonder if the phone itself was tampered with.Beware of this seller.

I ordered my phone on a Friday at August 12th and it said that it would get to me in about 1-2 business days because I chose the FedEx 2 day shipping. I understand that this wouldn’t ship immediately. I thought was going to ship on Monday but wasn’t till Wednesday when it was shipped. Also, I was told I was gonna get updates about my shipment but I didn’t get ANYTHING. The only thing I saw was that my order was placed nothing else. On Wednesday, If I didn’t complain about my phone not coming or saying I would never use Loop mobile again. I don’t know if would have got my phone or not or it would came much later. Furthermore, my order came a week later after my order and that was unacceptable especially when I didn’t get any update about my order AT ALL. So again as I mention in my complaint this will be the last time I order anything on Loop Mobile.

IN SHORT, MY PHONE DIDN'T COME IN 2 DAYS! I WAS OFFERED $20 REFUND TO CHANGE MY 1 STAR RATING TO A 5 STAR, AND THEY PUT REQUIRE SIGNATURE, SO I STILL DON'T HAVE PHONE. DON'T HAVE TIME TO GO INDETAIL NOW, ABOUT HOW BAD IT WAS DEALING WITH AUTOBOTS THAT GIVE GENERIC MESSAGES, ABOUT THEIR HOURS, YET IT WAS DURING THE TIME THEY WERE OPEN! PERIOD! DO NOT LET THE SALE PRICES ON ITEMS FOOL YOU, INTO DEALING WITH THIS COMPANY! UPDATE!!!! PHONE WAS DELIVERED TODAY, (WITH OUT A SIGNATURE!!!!!!!) BUT I THOUGHT THAT'S WHY, IT WASN'T LEFT YESTERDAY! WHAT A JOKE!! LOOP KEEP FLAGGING MY REVIEW SO I WILL SCREEN SHOT, ALL PUT THIS ON OTHER SITES!

Review.Titre: Damaged pristine and non responsive customer care
Review.Contenu: Ordered pristine grade iphone8 64 GB but got one with pixel burn in front screen. I have been trying to get in touch with customer service for week now but have not received any response yet. If anyone from Loop mobile sees this please do respond.
Never buying from here again. 2 day shipping turned out to be a week now and I still haven't gotten my phone. Dont get fooled by this 48 hr shipping bs
Condition that I paid for was stated as very good but phone is far from very good shape. I would rate the condition as mild.
I bought a premium Iphone 8 (Supposed to have at least 95% battery) but I received it with 87%
Rude. Not helpful. Rude. Rude.

I paid extra for a phone in "Pristine" condition. This did not apparently translate to the components of the phone as it came with only 85% battery life, the bare minimum they deliver without replacing the battery. This is a problem as the 2400 battery is already small for today's power demands. Neither of the phone numbers for customer service work and do not allow you to hold or wait. They just drop the call. To be fair, I did send an email ~24 hours ago and am waiting for a response from Loop. I will update my rating if my experience improves.

Review.Titre: 1)  Opened a ticket for a missing 20$…

Review.Contenu: They said that the battery was at 85% of its capacity, I know it is normal for it to last less than new watches but the battery lasts less than 5 hours.  it's totally lousy

Review.Contenu: Loop failed to honor it's shipping timing promise.  When I contacted customer service they did nothing about it.

Review.Titre: Wrong computer delivered, customer service unreachable
Review.Contenu: UPDATE: I was finally able to reach someone via this email address - info [at] loopmobile.us - and get a return sorted out. About a week after shipping the return, I got confirmation of my refund. I guess I'd just say shop at your own risk here, and know that the customer service phone line is kind of a dead end. Will recommend Computer Overhauls again as a good and reputable small business with quick shipping and good service.--Ordered a MacBook Air from Loop Mobile. After reading a handful of negative reviews about customer service, I figured the majority were positive and the price was right. It arrived in about 3 days, and when I opened it, not only was it packaged very loosely, it was not the computer I ordered. I immediately called the customer service line but countless attempts at different times of day have been answered by an automated "There are no agents available to take your call" message, and my email has gone unanswered for several days now. Luckily I did a payment plan, so only a portion of the cost is lost so far, but 3 additional payments are due to be drafted from my account for a computer I didn't order and don't want. I'm trying to return the one that was mistakenly delivered and just cancel my order for a refund, if someone will respond to me. For other customers, I'd recommend Backmarket (though they sell through there too, that's where I initially found them but prices were cheaper to order directly through the site) or Computer Overhauls instead.

Review.Titre: I am yet to receive the phones or any…
Review.Contenu: I am yet to receive the phones or any updates

Review.Titre: CONCERNED: No confirmation No tracking BUT CHARGED
Review.Contenu: I am very very concerned now after reading these conflicting reviews .I ordered a iPhone but confirmation email for my order no tracking details for my order ! What is frustrating is that there are several complaints about shipping etc why wouldn’t this company fix that issue !Also now I’m concerned about the quality of my phone I may or may not receive! The number attached to the charge on bank details is invalid ! It looks like this organization has plenty of business why isn’t these simple things managed  better ?The customer service number that starts with a 786 is also a joke and that doesn’t feel good either , at least offer the option to text or leave a voice message! Can someone reach out to me please ASAP!

Review.Titre: Not the best but not the worst
Review.Contenu: Pros: screen and back looks great, one week in no issues with the phone, new charging cable, competitive pricing, great website/interface, great correspondence with shipping updates.Cons: The phone was very dirty, wall adaptor was disgustingly dirty with visible hair, dirt, and burn marks.Conclusion: For paying the premium for “Pristine” I expected the phone to not have face grease on the screen, dirt and sludge blocking all the speaker ports, dirt in the ear speaker, and the wall adaptor to have burn marks on it. Overall I would probably buy from loop again-maybe.

Review.Titre: The first phone sent had screen damage
Review.Contenu: The first phone sent had screen damage. This was not the end of the world but it was frustrating trying to contact customer support. Only a foreign phone number on the website and no email response for several days. I also stated that I wanted a replacement phone but still had to wait for a refund and reorder myself. Eventually another phone was sent but there definitely have room for improvement. The phone was a mother's day present but ended up being 10 days late. Later the company did follow up and offer me a $20 refund for my inconvenience which was nice.

Review.Titre: The Apple Watch I received is rough by…
Review.Contenu: The Apple Watch I received is rough by the edges, not thoroughly clean , someWhite stuff on the edges of the glass battery is  running out  rather quickly with light use.
macbook battery came hooked, it doesn't stop plugged in, it only works with the power cord plugged in.
The cosmetic condition is great. The downside is the battery life won’t hold a charge for a day.

Review.Titre: Says it has a 12 month warranty but the…
Review.Contenu: Says it has a 12 month warranty but the phone is off. Other than that it works the best! Haven't had any problems.

It's was okay, it came on time but, when it came it had marks on the screen.

Review.Titre: Service was prompt and efficient. The product is well made and attractive. Only negative is that the case doesn’t cover the camera lenses.
Review.Contenu: Service was prompt and fficient

Loop Mobile delivered a very good looking product, good working condition. I cannot see any visible signs of the watch being refurbished. My only complaint about the Apple Watch I purchased is that the battery doesn't fully charge but that is what the conditions are of the purchase.  For an Apple Watch, a battery with 100% capability is a better fit for me.

They delivered what was promised. My only issue was the shipment required a signature, which I didn't know ahead of time. I had to create an alternate delivery address via FEDEX and pick the item up because I was not going to be home. Just an extra step but not ground shaking.

Phone arrived and works great. It arrived just as described. A few scruffs, but nothing major or highly noticeable for the price.The only reason I'm not giving this 5 stars is because of the shipping. It was advertised as 2 Day shipping, but I ordered on a Wednesday and received the following Monday.

Review.Titre: Good product, but warranty service was slow
Review.Contenu: Short version: I ordered a 2018 MacBook Pro from them in mid-December 2021. The video board failed six weeks later, and it took a lot of extra effort and time to get the warranty filled. But after five weeks, I had a nice replacement machine, which happened to be 1 year newer than the one I originally purchased. Longer story: To start with, the original order took 10 days to arrive via FedEx Ground (Ok, it was Christmas time). The computer was poorly packed, actually rattling around loose in the box.The computer's video board failed six weeks later, and getting warranty service under their 12-month warranty, was a challenge. There was no order confirmation email, and no clear way to get warranty coverage on the website. I found the customer support link on the bottom of the home page, replied to their request for photos immediately...and it took 7 days to get a shipping label. Shipping each way took a week, processing the return took a week, so the warranty process took 4 weeks. That was a long time to be without a computer!Ultimately, I got a good machine at a good price. But don't expect things to arrive as promptly as their website suggests, or warranty coverage to be super easy like the big competitors.
Thank you so much I was just checking on my package to see where it was located if you don’t mind to y’all keep me posted and when will I receive it

Review.Titre: It worked out great...just wished they'd checked their email
Review.Contenu: The actual purchase/shipping service was great.  I only knocked off a star because I tried to contact them during the time between ordering and shipping and it was crickets.  I was in a little bit of a pinch for time (about to leave on a two week trip) and I needed to verify when it would be shipping so that I would know where to ship it.  I had it shipped it to my home, hoping they'd come through quickly, and they did!  So it all worked out.  The phone came the night before we left.  But based on a few of their bad reviews, I thought they'd pay more attention to the emails.  They didn't, but like I said, the order was processed and the shipped as fast as possible so it worked out great.  Just a couple days of nail-biting.
Ordered Premium iphone 8, had some minor problems but Loop Mobile reached out and made it right. Using the phones and no issues or problems with them.

Review.Titre: I was promised 2 day delivery and it…
Review.Contenu: I was promised 2 day delivery and it took 4 days.
Quick shipping and the Iphone 12 pro max I received is working very well.

Review.Contenu: Bought a refurbished item from Loop. It was good. Repackaging is good

Review.Contenu: Delivered take to more than 2 days , mobile is great

Review.Contenu: The phone is what I wanted and in pristine condition as described. Only complaints I have is 1.) It was very loosely packed and was being thrown around in the box as it was shipped. 2.) The SIM card key was not in the box. I had to use a paper clip that was laying around the house. But other than those complaints, everything else was great!

Took a little while to get Here and phone was dead when I got it but it’s all good fam tree

Review.Titre: I'm in love with the phone

Review.Contenu: Great stuff.

Review.Titre: Couldn't Ask For A Smoother Transaction!
Review.Contenu: The communication was Excellent. Shipping was Fast.I purchased a refurbished Apple 7 watch. Price was very fair compared to new prices. The classification of Pristine was accurate. I like the requirement that buyer must sign to receive. I am very pleased with the entire transaction! I wish instructions were included.
Easy-peasy user friendly website. Navigating the website was a breeze. From the time I placed my order to the time it shipped was less time than some websites takes to process the payment alone.

Review.Titre: Refurb was basically open-box, with AppleCare
Review.Contenu: I bought a iPhone 13 mini in excellent condition and it arrived beautifully with an original apple packed cable and 11 months of applecare already paid for. Fantastic deal, quick shipping. (I really appreciate that loop commits to using OEM parts, as some other marketplaces can be more unpredictable.)

Review.Titre: My first delivery from Loop Mobile and a 5 Star Feeling!
Review.Contenu: After dealing with other online retailers, Loop Mobile  has shown service that I have not seen in any other   company in recent times.A company that returns calls, accepts responsibility, delivers a valuable product timely and a great customer experience! I love my new watch!!! Thank You!
The problem is solved. Thanks to Gabriela. I'd love to share with you that they are responsible for the problem.
Fast shipping & great price. I will be ordering from your website again & tell my family & friends for the great experience.

Review.Titre: Gabriela is so nice to give me an…
Review.Contenu: Gabriela is so nice to give me an upgrade for my Apple Watch that they accidentally sent the wrong one but the replacement was fast and got a nice upgrade..thanks a lot Gabriela for doin above and beyond for me and for being patient also to me when I keep asking regarding my watch..

Review.Titre: I received my phone promptly and as…
Review.Contenu: I received my phone promptly and as described, unfortunately the phone had problems charging and the battery would drain within 4 hours after being charged fully so i will have to have the battery changed. I was unable to return the phone to loop as I had already left the states and will be overseas for 6 months plus. **UPDATE Loop contacted me and offered me a replacement phone at no cost to me, the ,logistics were not entirely seamless due to my overseas location but a replacement phone arrived with some $ credit also. Loop worked hard to rectify my issue.

Just recently received this phone, everything checks out but a couple of things. First thing I noticed was dirt/ debris in every crevice, I would have thought the place would have air dusted this before sending out as “very good”.  A couple minor blemishes on the outer screen and deep cut in center of screen as well but hardly noticeable.  One thing though the speakers sound disoriented. Sometimes my sound gets higher then lower only when sounds on and using phone.

Review.Titre: I was a little suspect because I…
Review.Contenu: I was a little suspect because I usually order direct from apple and new, but I wanted a iPhone XS so after searching several sites I found Loop Mobile. I am so glad I did it was a great experience exactly what I wanted and way way cheaper. My iPhone is perfect and function perfectly. I am gonna tell more about Loop Mobile.

so i bought an iphone xs max from loop mobile. unfortunately, all cameras did not work after 6 months. after contact with loop mobile, a new iphone xs max is dispatched to replace my previous one. anyway, a reliable merchant. deserve to visit more.
Fast ship! As advertised.
I purchased an iPhone 12 Pro Max in Fair condition but when it arrived it was very good looking!! I’m extremely happy with my purchase! Thanks Loop Mobile!!

I purchased an I-Phone 12 ProMax in good condition. The phone looks and smells brand new. I was very happy that I got exactly what I purchased in great condition. No scratches on the screen nor body of the phone and it was completely unlocked so my sims card went right in and worked with no issues. I will continue to upgrade my phone through Loop. The only issue was FedEx shipping instead of 12/23 I got my phone 12/29 which was way after Christmas and a little disappointing.

So a few days ago I was frustrated with not being able to receive my order number and lack of communication about shipping , but I did get my phone so far so good ! I wanted to take the time to say I am pleased with the phone it looks brand new and besides the lack of communication the speed of service is really good and the price was extremely fair. TY!

Review.Titre: I got a call from customer care and…
Review.Contenu: I got a call from customer care and everything is resolved... She promptly addressed the matter as the phones were delivered and I wasn't informed via email (I stay at 2 homes 15 minutes apart)

Review.Titre: I love my PRISTINE Apple Watch
Review.Contenu: At first I was a little skeptical at the prices but after many many questions, that were answered in a timely fashion, and the other reviews, my concerns lessened. I ordered a pristine item and I couldn’t be happier with it. I see myself returning to get more products in the future.

Review.Titre: Saved myself $200 on Loop Mobile's Apple Watch Series…
Review.Contenu: I just purchased an Apple Watch Series 6 and it seriously looks brand-new! The ordering process was super simple to navigate. I received a number of emails confirming my order, providing tracking number, and updating me on the status of the shipment which was reassuring. My watch was delivered very quickly, despite it being a holiday weekend. I ended up saving myself over $200 purchasing through Loop Mobile. I would highly recommend as a cost-saving option.

Review.Titre: The purchase was smooth and the…
Review.Contenu: The purchase was smoothed and the delivery super quick. Very happy with my new watch! Just as described.

Review.Titre: Such a great and easy experience with…
Review.Contenu: Such a great and easy experience with loop! It delivered so quickly and came in perfect condition. I love shopping more sustainably so this was the best option for me!

Review.Titre: I didn’t need the phone in expedition…
Review.Contenu: I didn’t need the phone in expedition but the phone came in good timing. It looks and acts just as my other phone and I have no complaints. My only question is, is the packaging recyclable? Or compostable? Other than than loop mobile worked for me.

Saw you guys on Backmarket and noticed that your overall price was cheaper so I ordered. No dissatisfaction at all from me. The phone came as if it was brand new, charging port was spotless, no scratches or dents. At T-Mobile they confirmed the iPhone was real. Keep up the good work.

I purchased the Apple Watch Series 4 “pristine “ from your website and wanted to give it a couple of days of set up and test all of the features before reviewing. The watch I received was spotless, not a scratch on it and so far everything works. Battery health is at 94%, a big plus. I’m impressed with your product, I wanted one of these but always hesitated due to high cost. Nice job Loop Mobile!
Wonder experience with loop. Phone call s in excellent condition and it shipped really fast. Had phone in my hand 2 days after I ordered it. Will be buying my granddaughter an iPad next.

Extremely delighted with purchase of Iphone8 for my grandaughter. It was in excellent condition, great price, great shipping and service, and it also included a warranty which was a bonus. Thank you Loop.

Review.Titre: Aside from the fact that i am enjoying…
Review.Contenu: Aside from the fact that i am enjoying using this computer which replaced my computer from 2012, it is in pristine condition and that is exactly what Loop said that it was.  I am really happy with the company and they gave me a real deal besides.  Thanks, Loop!

Regarding purchase of refurbished iPhone 8:I am exceedingly pleased with the purchase of my “new” phone!  Delivery was on time and the selection of “pristine condition” was without any disappointment.  Transfer of information from my old phone and Activation by Verizon took place smoothly.  Thank you for a superior product.  I won’t hesitate to use your service again or recommend it to others.

Review.Titre: I ordered the wrong item entirely
Review.Contenu: I ordered the wrong item entirely - wrong model and wrong carrier compatibility. The ease of which Loop let me return the item and get my refund is A+ and so I'd shop with them again.
I had slight issue with communication (maybe they were lacking in staff) at start but at the end they were able to help with my issues and had been helpful. Will buy from site again!

Review.Titre: I appreciate that you sell phones that…
Review.Contenu: I appreciate that you sell phones that people like me can afford.  My niece told me about this site and I was able to get an IPhone 13 ProMax quickly, where AT&T said I had to wait til February.Thank you!

Review.Titre: Good value for the price. Great customer service! Would recommend. 👍
Review.Contenu: While I appreciate the 2 day shipping, it’s FedEx with a signature required. I’m always at work during the 10a-5p window, so making arrangements to be home to sign for the delivery was sort of a pain in the butt. Yes I could’ve arranged for a pickup on their website, but I’ve had packages “disappear” like that before so I’m always leery of going that route. Once I did receive the package, I discovered that they sent me the wrong color Apple watch. I was disappointed but the watch worked fine and I really wasn’t up to the whole return process, so I just kept the one they sent. The watch was in much better condition than I expected, having opted for one in “fair condition”. Very good value for the price.**Update** Jeannie from (I’m assuming) customer service, reached out to me regarding the wrong color being sent out. She apologized and offered me a partial credit for the inconvenience, since I did not want to deal with the returns process. Mistakes happen. I’ll accept that gesture as a sign that Loop Mobile wants to do right by their customers. For that reason I’m definitely comfortable giving them five stars and would recommend them to others.

Received MacBook Air on time. Loop Mobile has been great. It took a bit to learn the differences between the MAC OS as I am an old 77 years Windows user. It came in with no scratches or damage I could see. I tested it after running the battery down below 20% and gave it a good charge. I used it most of the next day and installed MS Word, Excel and Power Point I had purchased. All I can say right now is this MacBook is super. So far i love it!

I ordered an Apple Watch, and OMG!!! They said it would be here on Thursday I ordered on Tuesday and my watch was at my house THE NEXT DAY! When I got my watch it was perfect!!! Exactly what I ordered and expected!!!! I will definitely be recommending Loop Mobile to others and I’m so happy I chose to order from them!!!!!!♥️ THANK YOU SO MUCH LOOP MOBILE
Good service for less money.  Entertaining to interact with.  Proactive company.  Seemed too good to be true but it is true.  Tried it...liked it...owned it...keeping it.  No looking back.
iPhone 11 Pro Max I received was pristine condition.  So far all good.  Will definitely purchase another phone from Loop again.
Great deal, great laptop 👍 i would strongly recommend this company, speedy delivery, works and looks brand new, I’m super happy with it.

Review.Titre: Wish it was always this easy!
Review.Contenu: This was a seamless online buying experience. I received updates for each step of the order and got exactly what I ordered. This is how it's done! Thanks Loop. I will be back!

Review.Titre: Purchased an iPhone 12 in super good…

Pricing was good, the phones were better than described, and you knew exactly what the carrier was previously.  The last was a big help.
Excellent service , I ordered a iPhone XR good condition  , and it came in 18 hours. No trouble with the phone, IT CAME WITH 99% battery health. Will definitely buy from here in the future!

Review.Titre: Great quality and saves you tons of money!
Review.Contenu: I got an iPhone 8 for half their original cost and was in amazing condition! It came with a charger and a warranty in case I wasn’t happy with the phone I received.
I just ordered my second phone from Loop-Mobile and I am very satisfied with the product. The phones are reasonably priced and the condition was great. I would recommend to others.
This is the second time I’ve purchased a phone from Loop Mobile and I have no complaints. Fair pricing, good products, and fast shipping, what more could you ask for these days?
Ease of ordering, selecting choices of various features.  Fact that I had a good experience with the last phone.

Two day shipping and on my two week waiting and no phone. No one has been able to give me a straight answer or even offer a refund. This is a crime! I have paid for a phone and still have not received it. Very frustrating.***Update: I have received my phone and it is wonderful! The phone came late but it is a very good buy. FedEx held my product longer than promised. Loop sent it on time and packed it well. Give loop a try, just be patient with FedEx.
Highly recommend going with Loop Mobile. Appreciated the fact that they have the option to purchase phones with a guaranteed battery life of 95% or better.

I did a lot of looking around for a decently prices Apple Watch that I felt like would be of good quality. I either found watches that I felt like were too expensive for me or the sites had very bad reviews. Right when I was going to give up I ran into this site. I looked up previous customers reviews and they sold me. I was able to order what I was looking for and at a very reasonable price. When I got it from the delivery service I was blown away. It looked like a brand new watch, nobody would think that it was refurbished. So it looked good but I didn't know if the quality would match up. It did! Everything has been great. It charges to 100%, there were no flaws visually, and all of the features work perfectly. I am very happy that I found this site and made my purchase through them.
The iPhone 8 in the prescribe condition, is perfect. We have not had any problems with the phone. In the future I will recommend this site to anyone 😌
Easy ordering on line Good priceAnd prompt deliveryI’d recommend this company based on my experience
I am glad that I make this purchase! Phone came fast in excellent condition . Will recommend to anyone. Thank you!

I will be buying more in future from them. They are straight shooters.
Really good communication and product just as promised. Battery life was 100%. I could be happier! Thanks.
